Sentencas: Porous alloys are proposed as supports for the next generation solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: Their application lowers the price of the fuel cells, which will result in faster commercialization.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: However, they are prone to high temperature corrosion.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: So far, there is lack of methods, which can improve high temperature properties of porous alloys for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: A method for improving corrosion resistance of porous alloys has been proposed and investigated here.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: In this work protective coatings are prepared by the infiltration of precursor solutions that contain Y cations.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: High temperature oxidation properties of the modified alloys are compared with non-modified samples by cyclic thermogravimetry, electron microscopy and X-ray diffractometry measurements.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: The infiltration of Y precursor into the porous alloy decreases the high temperature corrosion rate.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys

Sentencas: This method can be used to improve long term properties of porous alloys applied for fuel cells supports.
Titulo: Coatings for improvement of high temperature corrosion resistance of porous alloys
